label: Daily
description: Data measured at a daily time scale.

label: 16 Day
description: Data measured at a 16 day time scale.

label: Monthly
description: Data measured at a monthly time scale.

label: Unfilled
description: Station data including only values provided by stations before going through QA/QC.

label: Partial Filled
description: This data has undergone QA/QC and is partially filled using statistical techniques to estimate some missing station values.

label: Dynamical
description: Dynamical downscaling uses high resolution regional climate models to extrapolate lower resolution global climate models down to an area of interest.

label: Statistical
description: Statistical downscaling uses historical climatological data to statistically approximate future values.

label: RCP 4.5
description: A climate scenario assuming peak emissions around 2040. This scenario approximates a rise in global temperature by between 2.5 and 3°C by the year 2100.

label: RCP 8.5
description: A worst case climate scenario assuming continuously rising rates of emissions. This scenario approximates a rise in global temperature of about 5°C by the year 2100.

label: Annual
description: Includes all annual data.

label: Wet
description: Only includes data from the wet season.

label: Dry
description: Only includes data from the dry season.

label: Present Day
description: Present day baseline values based on recorded climate data.

label: Mid-Century (2040-2069)
description: Mid-century (2040-2069) projections.

label: Late-Century (2070-2099)
description: Late-century (2070-2099) projections.

label: Late-Century (2080-2099)
description: Late-century (2080-2099) projections.

label: Statewide
description: Data covering the entire state of Hawaiʻi.

label: Hawaiʻi
description: Data covering Hawaiʻi county.

label: Maui
description: Data covering Maui county.

label: Honolulu
description: Data covering Honolulu county.

label: Kauaʻi
description: Data covering Kauaʻi county.

label: mm
description: Values in millimeters

label: in
description: Values in inches

label: °C
description: Values in degrees celcius

label: °F
description: Values in degrees fahrenheit

label: K
description: Values in kelvin
Percent change

label: Percent change
description: Percent change in value relative to present day conditions.

label: Absolute change
description: Change in value relative to present day conditions.

label: Value
description: Projected value

label: View Type
description: How should the data be viewed? Either view the data directly or relative to present conditions.

label: Time Period
description: The time period over which the data is measured.

label: Data Fill
description: The type of processing the station data goes through.

label: Downscaling Method
description: The type of downscaling climate model used for future projections.

label: Future Climate Model
description: The climate model used to predict future data.

label: Season
description: The season measurements and projections are made for.

label: Data Period
description: The period of coverage for the data to display, including baseline present day data and future projections

label: Spatial Extent
description: The area of coverage for the data.

label: Units
description: The units the data are represented in.

label: Station Data
description: These options apply only to the station data displayed on the map. Gridded map products are generated using partial filled station data.

label: Rainfall
description: Rainfall data (1990 - present).

label: Legacy Rainfall
description: Legacy rainfall data based on older production methods (1920 - 2012).

label: Maximum Temperature
description: Temperature data aggregated to its maximum value over the time period.

label: Minimum Temperature
description: Temperature data aggregated to its minimum value over the time period.

label: Mean Temperature
description: Temperature data aggregated to its average value over the time period.

label: Rainfall Projections
description: Downscaled future projections for rainfall data.

label: Temperature Projections
description: Downscaled future projections for temperature data.

label: NDVI
description: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index

label: Relative Humidity
description: Relative humidity data

label: Rainfall Map
description: A gridded rainfall map representing estimated rainfall values over the state of Hawaiʻi.

label: Temperature Map
description: A gridded temperature map representing the estimated temperature values over the state of Hawaiʻi.

label: Rainfall Map
description: A gridded rainfall map representing estimated present day or predicted future rainfall values.

label: Rainfall Change Map
description: A gridded map displaying the predicted change in rainfall from present day conditions.

label: Temperature Map
description: A gridded temperature map representing estimated present day or predicted future average temperature values.

label: Temperature Change Map
description: A gridded map displaying the predicted change in temperature from present day conditions.

label: Data Map
description: A gridded map representing estimated values over the state of Hawaiʻi.

label: Standard Error Map
description: The standard error values for the gridded map data.

label: Anomaly Map
description: The anomaly values for the gridded map.

label: Anomaly Standard Error
description: The standard error values for the gridded map's anomaly values.

label: Metadata and Error Metrics
description: Gridded map product metadata and error metrics.

label: Station Data
description: Processed station data including each station's metadata and values over a period of time

label: NDVI Map
description: A gridded normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) map representing estimated values over the state of Hawaiʻi.

label: Relative Humidity Map
description: A gridded relative humidity map representing estimated relative humidity percentages over the state of Hawaiʻi.

label: Map Data
description: Gridded mapped data files and metadata

label: Historical Rainfall
description: Datasets using empirical rainfall data.

label: Historical Temperature
description: Datasets using empirical temperature data

label: Future Climate Projections
description: Future climate projections using downscaling prediction methods.

label: Dataset
description: Select the type of data you would like to view. Hover over an option for a description of the dataset.

label: Station Data
description: Markers displaying climate sensor stations
